subject: Interscholastic Athletics
Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The football coach at Bridgeport Central High School could be suspended for violating a conference rule that prohibits winning by more than 50 points.
snippet: The football coach at Bridgeport Central High School could be suspended for violating a conference rule that prohibits winning by more than 50 points.
